aspectran.description: |{{underline}}Commands that can run examples:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}hello{{fg:off}} - Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value. | {{green}}hello2{{fg:off}} - Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value with margins. | {{green}}echo{{fg:off}} - It accepts parameters and print as is. | {{green}}echo2{{fg:off}} - It accepts parameters and attributes, and print them as is. | {{green}}login{{fg:off}} - It accepts parameters used for login and print them. | {{green}}chpw{{fg:off}} - It accepts parameters for changing the password and print them. | |{{underline}}To control Jetty, try one of the following commands:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}jetty{{fg:off}} - Displays commands required to control Jetty Server | {{green}}jetty start{{fg:off}} - Runs a Jetty Server | {{green}}jetty stop{{fg:off}} - Stops the currently running Jetty Server | |{{underline}}Running! Point your browsers to:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}http://localhost:8080/{{fg:off}} |
